description: Pretty floral stud earrings with brilliant fanned crystals. A gorgeous statement piece with a vintage-inspired look. Prefer something a little more understated? Try the mini version: Micah Studs Wear with: Parker Bracelet or Montellier Bracelet
opinions: These earrings are beautiful and very well made.
Received these as a gift and they are just gorgeous. So much prettier than the pictures!
Really happy with my purchase. These earrings are the perfect accessory for any outfit.
The crystals on these earrings sparkle so beautifully. I'm in love!
